摘要：统计眼动采样丢失率不合格的列表

加载包
```{r} 
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(furrr)
library(data.table)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# 读取丢失率信息
dt <- read_csv("/Users/placenameday/R study/yajuan_data/out/loss_rate/A002.raw.csv")

# 生成丢失率大于0.2的pic列表,赋值给pic_list
pic_list <- dt %>% filter(track_loss_rate_pic > 0.2) %>% select(block, pic)

# 生成丢失率大于0.2的block列表,赋值给block_list
block_list <- dt %>% filter(track_loss_rate_block > 0.2) %>% select(block) %>% distinct()

```
